questions: What programs does Iron Lady offer?
Is the program online or offline
Who are the mentors or coaches?
answers: Iron Lady offers leadership programs focusing on confidence, communication, and executive presence for women.
Most programs run between 8 to 12 weeks, depending on the level and format.
The programs are conducted online, with live interactive sessions.
Yes, participants receive certificates upon successful completion.
The programs are led by experienced leadership coaches and industry mentors from Iron Lady.
